sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO T_NW_SERVICE_TRANSPORT( TRANSVCID, STATUS, RESULTMSG, NWNAME, SVCID, PWLABELID, ETHTYPE, CONNTYPE, EQUIPID, EQUIPNAME, EQUIPINBOUNDPORTID, EQUIPOUTBOUNDPORTID, EQUIPBW, EQUIPVLANID, ASSOCIATEDSWID, ASSOCIATEDSWTYPE, QOSOFEIR, QOSOFCIR) VALUES (#transvcid#, #status#, #resultmsg#, #nwname#, #svcid#, #pwlabelid#, #ethtype#, #conntype#, #equipid#, #equipname#, #equipinboundportid#, #equipoutboundportid#, #equipbw#, #equipvlanid#, #associatedswid#, #associatedswtype#, #qosofeir#, #qosofcir#)
sqlMap.select: SELECT TRANSVCID, STATUS, RESULTMSG, NWNAME, SVCID, PWLABELID, ETHTYPE, CONNTYPE, EQUIPID, EQUIPNAME, EQUIPINBOUNDPORTID, EQUIPOUTBOUNDPORTID, EQUIPBW, EQUIPVLANID, ASSOCIATEDSWID, ASSOCIATEDSWTYPE, QOSOFEIR, QOSOFCIR FROM T_NW_SERVICE_TRANSPORT

SELECT STATUS, RESULTMSG, NWNAME, SVCID, PWLABELID, ETHTYPE, CONNTYPE, EQUIPID, EQUIPNAME, EQUIPINBOUNDPORTID, EQUIPOUTBOUNDPORTID, EQUIPBW, EQUIPVLANID, ASSOCIATEDSWID, ASSOCIATEDSWTYPE, QOSOFEIR, QOSOFCIR FROM T_NW_SERVICE_TRANSPORT WHERE TRANSVCID = #transvcid# and EQUIPID = #equipid# and ASSOCIATEDSWID = #associatedswid# and SVCID = #svcid#
sqlMap.update: UPDATE T_NW_SERVICE_TRANSPORT SET STATUS = #status#, RESULTMSG = #resultmsg#, NWNAME = #nwname#, PWLABELID = #pwlabelid#, ETHTYPE = #ethtype#, CONNTYPE = #conntype#, EQUIPNAME = #equipname#, EQUIPINBOUNDPORTID = #equipinboundportid#, EQUIPOUTBOUNDPORTID = #equipoutboundportid#, EQUIPBW = #equipbw#, EQUIPVLANID = #equipvlanid#, ASSOCIATEDSWID = #associatedswid#, ASSOCIATEDSWTYPE = #associatedswtype#, QOSOFEIR = #qosofeir#, QOSOFCIR = #qosofcir# WHERE TRANSVCID = #transvcid# and EQUIPID = #equipid# and ASSOCIATEDSWID = #associatedswid# and SVCID = #svcid#
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM T_NW_SERVICE_TRANSPORT WHERE TRANSVCID = #transvcid# and EQUIPID = #equipid# and ASSOCIATEDSWID = #associatedswid# and SVCID = #svcid#
